title: Randomly can't download 60%
body:
So I've been using a Mac, which usually downloads the whole thing, but when I reinstalled, it was only able to download 40%
Any thoughts?

replies.body: I wonder if that Mac was having the equivalent problem as Windows "permissions" issues. Mac still has some admin settings that need to be set up so League can properly update/install, so check out [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) on how you can get those situated if you aren't sure, and definitely let me know if this doesn't fix that download problem!
It didn't work, guess I'll try to reinstall for the 3rd time :/ Thx for the advice doe!

Ayyyy it's what I'm here for! Sorry that didn't help right off the bat, but go ahead and reach out to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like! They'll be able to walk you through some better 1v1 troubleshooting with you there ^_^!
